受影響既遊客其實都要安撫。 (係事先通知, 唔係道歉)

同時可以話比全世界知，香港人真係比暴政走投無路，先要行到呢一步。已經差唔多三個月啦，再拖只會有更多前線受傷同埋受凌辱。

例如, 好耐之前, 其實自己都寫左份。當然，英文就好一般啦：

//To tourists in HK and those who planned to come to HK,

There will be protests against the extradition bill and brutalities of HK Police on the coming Sunday.
Hong Kong is ill, and we are trying our best to cure it.
I hope you will not be troubled due to the brutalities of cops in Hong Kong and thank you in advance for your understanding.
Or you are also very welcome to join us in the streets, or in the Hong Kong International Airport.

Regards,
Hong Kong Citizens//
